segments.text: There are many art craft items in this shop . I suggest you take your time , and you might find something you like .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's what I am going to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you have any problem , please come to me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I surely will . How much is this wood carving ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are an expert on it . That wood carving is very rare . But I'm so sorry . that is not for sell .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's OK . Is anything else recommended ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any special request ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to see some traditional arts .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So that means you are shopping for presents ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'm just here to pick out some special presents for my foreign friends .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I think the paper-cuts is OK , because it is easy to carry and foreign friends are also interested in it . They think that is a miracle .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have collected different kinds of paper-cuts all over the country , you can pick the one you like best .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You collect them yourself ? I think that you are just doing the wholesale .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: As a matter of fact , I open the shop because I'm interested in the arts . I spent lots of time doing research on the folk art of our country .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , you are the expert on it .
segments.speaker: S2
